resources.string: Enter the phone number you want to message on WhatsApp (along with country code)
Here you are given a chance to select the language in which you want to view the app contents.
Here you need to select the country code of the country to which the Phone Number belongs to.
Here,you need to enter the Phone Number whom you want to message.
Pressing this button, redirects to WHATSAPP app, where you can send message without saving the number.
